title: How to speed up web content delivery - Quora

response.answer_text: These are a couple of factors that will greatly enhance your Pagespeed scoring. It’s great when writing a letter, you can centralise the written content, position the address content left or right. I bet you’re thinking what is he talking about I know it’s late and he’s probably drinking some booze when writing this. Well Microsoft’s WORD practically fixes most all you need to optimise your HTML, CSS and JavaScripts, something I thought up, simple. What WORD does is remove all your “White Space” within. When GoogleBOT comes a crawling it wants to pass through as quickly as possible. Whenever it sees an empty space on your HTML page it stops looking at it and sees nothing, carries on and sees more white space and keeps stopping. 👇🏿👇🏿  Once white space has been removed, Optimise all and I mean all your images then test your scoring. Cheers!

It depends why it is slow. You may want to check this answer to see what may be involved: Daniel Chvatik's answer to Why is my website’s TTFB so high? without knowing what is wrong and which part of the stack is slow, no specific answer can be given.
